## alertHiddenCustom() function

Gets indication whether hide alerts or not for control, with custom indication of submitted

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function alertHiddenCustom(form: NgForm | FormGroup, control: string, errors?: string[], submitted?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | NgForm \| FormGroup | Form containing controls |
|  control | string | Controls name that will be checked |
|  errors | string\[\] | Array of validation errors to be checked for existance |
|  submitted | boolean | Indication whether form was submitted |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
